channel.title: TGaceAllStories

item.title: Wednesday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session

item.title: Believe in Elon Musk’s $1 trillion ‘waste and fraud’ jackpot when you see it

item.title: Evercore ISI upgrades this bank stock ahead of a major deal closing later in 2025
item.description: While shares of Capital One Financial have underperformed in recent weeks, it may be poised for gains in the path ahead, according to Evercore ISI.

item.title: All weather stocks: Two more names to ride out this rough market
item.description: We started with the All Weather list because of some troubling signs in the markets and the economy.

item.title: Apple gets a price target cut from Morgan Stanley due to Siri update delay, U.S. tariffs
item.description: A couple of recent catalysts could mean less growth for Apple shares in the coming months, according to Morgan Stanley.

item.title: Treasury yields edge up after CPI inflation data comes in cooler than expected
item.description: Bond yields turned higher Wednesday after the consumer-price index report for February came in cooler than Wall Street expected.
